description: This file defines an Angular component named 'GameCanvasComponent' that manages the game rendering, input handling, and game loop logic for the frontend of a game application. It uses services for game state management and audio control, and handles canvas resizing, user input events, and animation frame updates.

classes.name: GameCanvasComponent
classes.description: Angular component responsible for rendering the game on a canvas, handling user input, and managing game states and animation loop.

methods.name: ngAfterViewInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook to initialize the game canvas and start the game loop after the view is initialized.

methods.name: resizeCanvas
methods.description: Adjusts the size of the game canvas in response to window resize events.

methods.name: loop
methods.description: Main game loop that updates game state, renders frames, and manages game over or level completion conditions.

methods.name: startGame
methods.description: Initializes and starts the game, resets input state, and starts music playback.

methods.name: restartGame
methods.description: Restarts the game by invoking startGame.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles keydown events for game controls, forwarding relevant keys to game service.

methods.name: onKeyUp
methods.description: Handles keyup events, notifying the game service.

methods.name: onTouchStart
methods.description: Handles touch start events for mobile input.

methods.name: onTouchMove
methods.description: Handles touch move events for mobile input.

methods.name: onTouchEnd
methods.description: Handles touch end events for mobile input.
